RTCIceCandidatePairStatsResponsesReceive.summary: The responsesReceived property in the dictionary indicates the total number of {{Glossary("STUN")}} connectivity check responses that have been received on the connection described by this pair of candidates.
RTCIceCandidatePairStatsResponsesReceive.value: An integer value which specifies the number of STUN connectivity request responses that have been received on the connection described by this pair of candidates so far.
